title: [LFT] Platinum 1 Mid/Jungle/Sup/Top Player looking for OOL team
body:
Hi guys, would love to join a competitive team, whether that be for OOL or a diamond ranked team
For anyone looking for another team member (either as a regular or as a sub player), I'd be happy to play.
My peak rank is Platinum 1 (I didn't have much time to play ranked during school but, now that I have the time I believe I could get mid to high diamond), and I play all roles comfortably except ADC.
I use Discord and Skype primarily! And I am also a capable shotcaller if needed

Mid champs: Pretty much anyone
Jungle: Most tank junglers (Heca, Zac etc), Graves, Lee Sin
Top: Sion, Camille, Jayce, Kennen, most tank tops
Support: Thresh, Leo, Naut, Zyra, Brand, Karma, Blitz, Morg etc etc

Heres my OPGG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blizzard9789
